summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting distribution easements over portions of Lot 12, Block 4, First Addition to Adams Home Tracts; Lot 4, Block 1, North Side Five Acre Tracts; Lot 14, Block 86, Gilman's Addition to Seattle; Lot 1, Block 7, Robbins View Tract Addition to Riverton; Lot 17, Block 2, Steel Plant Addition; Lot 11, Block 281, Seattle Tide Lands; Section 36, Township 26 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; Lot 1, King County Short Plat 584112; Lot 8, Block 1, Woodcrest Addition; Lot 2, Block 73, H.E. Orr Park Division No. 7; and Lot 2, Block 5, Bonnie Glen; and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
